name: Harvest Moon: Magical Melody
description:
Flower Bud Village was just a blossom of a burg when you bought a plot
of land there. Now newcomers depend on the bounty from your farm for
their livelihoods. It’s up to you to create a farm, raise a family and
build a village in the most challenging Harvest ever!

Features

• Buy farmland next to a river, along seashore or in a village!
•
Plant crops, raise livestock, dig for gems or just fish!
• Beat your
farming rival in the fields and at the festivals!
• Unlock hidden
multiplayer mini games!
